title: User Registration with Email Validation and Role Assignment
description: Verify that new user registration validates email format, enforces role constraints and creates user with correct permissions.

steps.description: Navigate to user registration page
Input valid user information with correctly formatted email and select a role (Administrator, Physiotherapist, Intern, Patient, Clinic Staff)
Submit the registration form
Confirm registration success and user is assigned the correct role and permissions
Attempt registration with invalid email formats (missing @, missing domain, etc.)
Validate error messages prevent registration and prompt for correct email format
Attempt registration with missing role selection
Validate error prevents registration without proper role assignment

title: Patient Creation with CPF Validation and Duplicate Prevention
description: Ensure system validates CPF format, required fields, and prevents duplicate patient records.

steps.description: Navigate to patient creation form
Input all mandatory patient data including a correctly formatted CPF
Submit the patient creation form
Patient is created successfully
Attempt to create another patient with identical CPF
System blocks duplicate and displays duplicate patient error
Input invalid CPF formats and submit form
System prevents submission and displays validation error for CPF

title: Appointment Scheduling with Conflict and Recurrence Handling
description: Validate appointment creation across daily, weekly, monthly views prevents overlapping conflicts and supports recurring appointments.

steps.description: Open appointment scheduling interface
Create an appointment for a patient at a specific time slot
Appointment is saved and appears correctly in daily, weekly, monthly, and list views
Attempt to create another appointment overlapping the same time slot
System prevents creation and shows conflict notification
Create a recurring appointment and verify series in schedule views
Recurring appointments are displayed properly and conflict prevention applies to all instances

title: Clinical Documentation Editor Features
description: Verify SOAP editor supports rich text input, auto-save, versioning, and digital signature functionality.

steps.description: Open a patient medical record and access SOAP evaluation editor
Input rich text content including bold, italics, bullet lists and images
Rich text formatting is saved and displayed correctly
Wait for auto-save to trigger or trigger manual save
Content is saved without data loss and version history is created
Edit the content and access version history
Can view previous versions and restore if needed
Apply digital signature to document
Signature is saved and document is locked for further edits

title: AI Assistant Protocol Suggestions and Report Generation Accuracy
description: Validate AI assistant generates clinical reports, protocol suggestions, risk analysis and inquiries with at least 95% accuracy as reviewed by experts.

steps.description: Access AI Assistant module within a patient session
Input relevant clinical data and request automatic report generation
Generated report contains accurate protocol suggestions, risk analysis and clinical inquiries
Compare AI outputs against expert validated benchmarks
Achieve a minimum accuracy of 95% for AI-generated content
Test error scenarios where AI receives incomplete or ambiguous data
AI returns meaningful fallback messages or requests additional data

title: Interactive Body Map Pain Point Visualization
description: Verify that users can accurately mark pain points on front and back human body views and see pain evolution charts.

steps.description: Open the Interactive Body Map interface
Mark and save multiple pain points on frontal view
Pain points are plotted correctly and saved
Switch to posterior view and mark additional pain points
Pain points appear on posterior view without affecting frontal markings
Access Pain Evolution Chart for marked points
Chart correctly displays historical pain data over time

title: Patient Portal Access and Data Privacy
description: Validate patient login, secure access to personal records, prescribed exercises, appointments, and communication features with privacy controls.

steps.description: Patient attempts login with valid credentials
Access is granted and dashboard loads within 2 seconds on simulated 3G connection
Patient views treatment history, prescribed exercises and appointment list
All data corresponds to only the logged-in patient and is correctly rendered
Patient tries to access another patient's records via URL hacking
Access denied and proper error shown, no data leaked
Test security controls including logout, session expiration and two-factor authentication
System enforces secure logout, session timeout and 2FA where applicable

title: Operational Dashboard and Reporting Export Functionality
description: Test financial, clinical and productivity reports display accurate data and export correctly to PDF, Excel and CSV with integrity checks.

steps.description: Navigate to operational dashboards
View financial, clinical and productivity analytics with various filters
Analytics data is accurate and updates dynamically with filters
Export reports in PDF format
PDF opens correctly, contains all data and formatting is preserved
Export reports in Excel and CSV formats
Excel and CSV files contain full data sets with correct delimiters and no data corruption

title: Financial Management with Payment Integrations and Delinquency Control
description: Validate multiple payment gateways integration, transaction recording, and delinquency alert functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to financial management section
Initiate payment via each supported payment integration
Payments processed successfully and transaction recorded
Simulate delayed or failed payments
Delinquency controls trigger alerts and restrict further scheduling as per policy

title: Inventory Management Stock Alerts and Movement History
description: Confirm materials categorized properly, stock alerts trigger on low levels, and all inventory movements are logged.

steps.description: Access inventory management interface
Add various materials under different categories
Materials appear correctly categorized
Reduce item stock to below alert threshold
Stock alert notification triggers
Review inventory movement history for the modified items
All stock changes are accurately logged with time and user details

title: Task Management with Priority, Progress Tracking, and Notifications
description: Verify creation of tasks with priorities, ability to update progress, and that notifications are sent correctly.

steps.description: Create new task with assigned priority and deadline
Task is saved and visible in task list with correct details
Update progress status of the task (e.g., in-progress, completed)
Progress updates reflect accurately and trigger notifications to assigned users
Mark task as completed
Task status updates to completed and no further notifications are sent

title: System Performance and Reliability under Concurrent Users
description: Test system behavior when 100 concurrent users access with expected uptime reliability of 99.5%.

steps.description: Simulate 100 concurrent users performing varied operations across modules
System remains responsive with load times under 2 seconds (including 3G network simulation)
No crashes or service outages occur meeting 99.5% uptime over the test duration

title: Security Compliance: Encrypted Storage, Two-Factor Authentication and LGPD
description: Verify encrypted data storage, mandatory 2FA for high privilege users, audit logs, and compliance with LGPD privacy regulations.

steps.description: Create and retrieve sensitive data in the system
Data at rest is encrypted and securely stored in database
Attempt login with administrator account requiring two-factor authentication
2FA is enforced before granting access
Review audit logs for user activities and data access
Logs correctly record user actions with timestamps and details
Review system privacy policies and data handling to ensure LGPD compliance
System implements required user data access, consent, and deletion policies
